Indian Grinding Rock State Historic Park.address: 14881 Pine Grove Volcano Rd , Pine Grove , CA 95665
reviewComments: While touring Hwy 49, we took a side trip to the small town of Volcano where you can find the Indian Grinding Rock State Park. Well worth it. Just amazing to see all the ground... read more
Lot's of interactive activities. Very informational. Covered outdoor tables for picnics. gift shop affordable for kids.
Interesting place to take your kids. Tours are full of information and the gift shop has lots of interesting items
Really well done park - very educational and respectful of the native culture. It's a beautiful spot to stop, stretch your legs, and learn something. Great for kids.
Small but informative museum. The grinding rocks are evocative. Definitely worth a visit. Takes 1 to 2 hours to see.
